lexUnit.name: succeed.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: take over an office, title, etc. from (someone). This LU emaphasizes the time aspect of the Take_place_of acion.

sentence.text: An editorial in the Irish Times said Al Gore was `` one of the happiest people '' on St. Patrick's Day because Irish - American Democrats had endorsed him to succeed Clinton in next year 's election .
